name: Escape - Game for PizzaJam
description:
Hey !The French  Mr Wawa is here ! (Game for PizzaJam)

Today I present my project "Escape" This game was be creat for the PIZZAAAAAAJAAAMM :) oops sorry ! Lets do this for my little prototype ! 

In the game : You need to escape from your dream, you don't understand why you are an prisonner, prisonner of your dream. Good luck ( 5 - 10 min to gameplay)

All the game is creat with Blender (no unity or other real Softwar)

thx for your feedback !! byebye
